text: Hopea plagata is a species of flowering plant in the family Dipterocarpaceae. It is found in Borneo and the Philippines. The tree grows to 55m tall. ==References== plagata Category:Trees of Borneo Category:Trees of the Philippines Category:Flora of Mindanao Category:Critically endangered flora of Asia Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot Category:Taxa named by Francisco Manuel Blanco
title: Hopea plagata
